channel.title: Comments on: Arduino FIO DS18B20 Temperature Logger
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: Iya
item.dc:creator: Iya
item.description: Great tinkering! Can I use xBee S2B Pro with this? Have you tried multiple arduino fio + xbee + ds18b20 with this?
item.content:encoded:
Great tinkering!
Can I use xBee S2B Pro with this? Have you tried multiple arduino fio + xbee + ds18b20 with this?
